trans-unit.source: SQL Server Deployment extension for Azure Data Studio
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Studio용 SQL Server 배포 확장

trans-unit.source: Provides a notebook-based experience to deploy Microsoft SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Microsoft SQL Server 배포를 위한 Notebook 기반 환경을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Run SQL Server container image with docker
trans-unit.target: Docker를 사용하여 SQL Server 컨테이너 이미지 실행

trans-unit.source: SQL Server Big Data Cluster allows you to deploy scalable clusters of SQL Server, Spark, and HDFS containers running on Kubernetes
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 빅 데이터 클러스터를 사용하면 Kubernetes에서 실행되는 SQL Server, Spark 및 HDFS 컨테이너의 확장 가능한 클러스터를 배포할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Existing Azure Red Hat OpenShift cluster
trans-unit.target: Existing Azure Red Hat OpenShift cluster

trans-unit.source: SQL Server Big Data Cluster settings
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 빅 데이터 클러스터 설정

trans-unit.source: Run SQL Server on Windows, select a version to get started.
trans-unit.target: Windows에서 SQL Server를 실행하고 시작할 버전을 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: Location of the azdata package used for the install command
trans-unit.target: Location of the azdata package used for the install command

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine

trans-unit.source: Create SQL virtual machines on Azure. Best for migrations and applications requiring OS-level access.
trans-unit.target: Create SQL virtual machines on Azure. Best for migrations and applications requiring OS-level access.

trans-unit.source: Create a SQL database, database server, or elastic pool in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Create a SQL database, database server, or elastic pool in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Create a SQL Managed Instance in either Azure or a customer-managed environment
trans-unit.target: Create a SQL Managed Instance in either Azure or a customer-managed environment

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Managed Instance provides full SQL Server access and feature compatibility for migrating SQL Servers to Azure, or developing new applications. {0}.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Managed Instance provides full SQL Server access and feature compatibility for migrating SQL Servers to Azure, or developing new applications. {0}.

trans-unit.source: Configure the settings to create an Azure Kubernetes Service cluster
trans-unit.target: Azure Kubernetes Service 클러스터를 만들기 위한 설정 구성

trans-unit.source: The default subscription will be used if you leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: 이 필드를 비워 두면 기본 구독이 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The cluster name must consist only of alphanumeric lowercase characters or '-' and must start and end with an alphanumeric character.
trans-unit.target: The cluster name must consist only of alphanumeric lowercase characters or '-' and must start and end with an alphanumeric character.

trans-unit.source: Configure the SQL Server Big Data Cluster settings
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 빅 데이터 클러스터 설정 구성

trans-unit.source: This username will be used for controller and SQL Server. Username for the gateway will be root.
trans-unit.target: 이 사용자 이름은 컨트롤러 및 SQL Server에 사용됩니다. 게이트웨이의 사용자 이름은 root입니다.

trans-unit.source: This password can be used to access the controller, SQL Server and gateway.
trans-unit.target: 이 암호를 사용하여 컨트롤러, SQL Server 및 게이트웨이에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Distinguished name for the organizational unit. For example: OU=bdc,DC=contoso,DC=com.
trans-unit.target: 조직 구성 단위의 고유 이름(예: OU=bdc,DC=contoso,DC=com)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use comma to separate the values.
Fully qualified domain names for the domain controller. For example: DC1.CONTOSO.COM. Use comma to separate multiple FQDNs.
trans-unit.target: 도메인 컨트롤러의 정규화된 도메인 이름(예: DC1. CONTOSO.COM)입니다. 쉼표를 사용하여 여러 FQDN을 구분합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use comma to separate the values.
Domain DNS servers' IP Addresses. Use comma to separate multiple IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 도메인 DNS 서버의 IP 주소입니다. 쉼표를 사용하여 여러 IP 주소를 구분합니다.

trans-unit.source: If not provided, the domain DNS name will be used as the default value.
trans-unit.target: If not provided, the domain DNS name will be used as the default value.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory group for cluster admin.
Use comma to separate the values.
The Active Directory users/groups with cluster users role. Use comma to separate multiple users/groups.
trans-unit.target: 클러스터 사용자 역할이 있는 Active Directory 사용자/그룹입니다. 쉼표를 사용하여 여러 사용자/그룹을 구분합니다.

trans-unit.source: Domain service account for Big Data Cluster
trans-unit.target: 빅 데이터 클러스터의 도메인 서비스 계정

trans-unit.source: Use comma to separate the values.
The Active Directory users or groups with app owners role. Use comma to separate multiple users/groups.
trans-unit.target: 앱 소유자 역할이 있는 Active Directory 사용자 또는 그룹입니다. 쉼표를 사용하여 여러 사용자/그룹을 구분합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use comma to separate the values.
The Active Directory users or groups of app readers. Use comma as separator them if there are multiple users/groups.
trans-unit.target: 앱 읽기 권한자의 Active Directory 사용자 또는 그룹입니다. 여러 사용자/그룹이 있는 경우 쉼표를 구분 기호로 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: A unique DNS subdomain to use for this SQL Server Big Data Cluster. If not provided, the cluster name will be used as the default value.
trans-unit.target: A unique DNS subdomain to use for this SQL Server Big Data Cluster. If not provided, the cluster name will be used as the default value.

trans-unit.source: A unique prefix for AD accounts SQL Server Big Data Cluster will generate. If not provided, the subdomain name will be used as the default value. If a subdomain is not provided, the cluster name will be used as the default value.
trans-unit.target: A unique prefix for AD accounts SQL Server Big Data Cluster will generate. If not provided, the subdomain name will be used as the default value. If a subdomain is not provided, the cluster name will be used as the default value.

trans-unit.source: There are some errors on this page, click 'Show Details' to view the errors.
trans-unit.target: 이 페이지에 오류가 있습니다. 오류를 보려면 '세부 정보 표시'를 클릭합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default Controller storage settings will be applied to other services as well, you can expand the advanced storage settings to configure storage for other services.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 컨트롤러 스토리지 설정은 다른 서비스에도 적용되며 고급 스토리지 설정을 확장하여 다른 서비스용으로 스토리지를 구성할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: kube 구성 파일을 선택한 후 목록에서 클러스터 컨텍스트 선택

trans-unit.source: Failed to load the config file
Password must be between 12 and 123 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Password must be between 12 and 123 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Password must have 3 of the following: 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character.
trans-unit.target: Password must have 3 of the following: 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine name must be between 1 and 15 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine name must be between 1 and 15 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine name cannot contain only numbers.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine name cannot contain only numbers.

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine name Can't start with underscore. Can't end with period or hyphen
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine name Can't start with underscore. Can't end with period or hyphen

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine name cannot contain special characters \/""[]:|<>+=;,?*@&, .
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine name cannot contain special characters \/""[]:|<>+=;,?*@&, .

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine name must be unique in the current resource group.
trans-unit.target: Virtual machine name must be unique in the current resource group.

trans-unit.source: Username must be between 1 and 20 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Username must be between 1 and 20 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Username must not include reserved words.
trans-unit.target: Username must not include reserved words.

trans-unit.source: Password and confirm password must match.
trans-unit.target: Password and confirm password must match.

trans-unit.source: Select a valid virtual machine size.
trans-unit.target: Select a valid virtual machine size.

trans-unit.target: Enter name for new virtual network

trans-unit.source: Enter name for new public IP
trans-unit.target: Enter name for new public IP

trans-unit.source: Virtual Network name must be between 2 and 64 characters long
trans-unit.target: Virtual Network name must be between 2 and 64 characters long

trans-unit.source: Subnet name must be between 1 and 80 characters long
trans-unit.target: Subnet name must be between 1 and 80 characters long

trans-unit.source: Public IP name must be between 1 and 80 characters long
trans-unit.target: Public IP name must be between 1 and 80 characters long

trans-unit.source: Create a new new public Ip
trans-unit.target: Create a new new public Ip

trans-unit.source: Username must be between 2 and 128 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Username must be between 2 and 128 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Password and confirm password must match.
trans-unit.target: Password and confirm password must match.

trans-unit.source: Firewall name cannot contain only numbers.
trans-unit.target: Firewall name cannot contain only numbers.

trans-unit.source: Firewall name must be between 1 and 100 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Firewall name must be between 1 and 100 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Firewall name cannot contain special characters \/""[]:|<>+=;,?*@&, .
trans-unit.target: Firewall name cannot contain special characters \/""[]:|<>+=;,?*@&, .

trans-unit.source: Upper case letters are not allowed for firewall name
trans-unit.target: Upper case letters are not allowed for firewall name

trans-unit.source: Database name cannot contain only numbers.
trans-unit.target: Database name cannot contain only numbers.

trans-unit.source: Database name must be between 1 and 100 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Database name must be between 1 and 100 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Database name cannot contain special characters \/""[]:|<>+=;,?*@&, .
trans-unit.target: Database name cannot contain special characters \/""[]:|<>+=;,?*@&, .

trans-unit.source: Database name must be unique in the current server.
trans-unit.target: Database name must be unique in the current server.

trans-unit.target: Collation name cannot contain only numbers.

trans-unit.target: Collation name must be between 1 and 100 characters long.
